resources.string: Your device is below API 21 (Lollipop).\n This application is maintained for Lollipop and above.
Your device does not have Bluetooth or it is not working properly.\n If your device specification has bluetooth, please ask assistance with your vendor.
Your device does not have Bluetooth Low Energy (Smart Bluetooth).\n This application requires Bluetooth specification 4.0. Please ask assistance with your vendor.
You have denied location permissions. Please enable them from application info.
